name: FonTel - Call Recorder
description: FonTel - Call Recorder is a free application which record the phone calls automatically. To protect your privacy call recordings can be encrypted and access to application can be password protected.  NOTE: Uninstall other call recording applications before use this app  Features:  SECURITY  recordings encryption  password protection  user with limited privileges  neutral application name and icon (option)  no ads, no sharing your device ID with others (ad agency, etc.)  CALL RECORDING  configuration wizard  automatic recording of all calls or only incoming or only outgoing  manual recording mode (on / off recording during a call)  after call action (save or remove recording, make a note)  included/excluded numbers**  recording outgoing calls with a delay  recording incoming calls in advance  different settings for Bluetooth calls  WAV (G.711) or AMR-NB file format  Audio gain up to 30dB  Automatic gain control  automatically delete the oldest recordings to keep free space or after a certain time *  USE  built-in player with a call graph  Primary processing of recordings (equalization quiet and loud parts of the conversation, increasing volume, normalization)  playback through the speaker or handset  grouping conversations by date  notes  filter recordings (all, only outgoing, only incoming, or only missed)  presentation of the names and contact photos**  search recordings by number**, a note or a contact name**  share recording via e-mail, MMS, Bluetooth, Google Drive, Dropbox, etc..  ARCHIVING  Integration with Dropbox, Google Drive and OneDrive *  support the FonTel Backup program (http://www.fontel.eu/backup.html - automatic archiving in the external archive)  * The free version limits storage of recordings in archive to three days and does not support for archive synchronization (no integration with Dropbox, Google Drive and OneDrive). To remove the limitations buy full version or activate a free 14-day trial period directly from the application. ** Due to restrictions introduced by Google from March 9, 2019, the version of the application downloaded from the Google Play store will not recognize and store phone numbers. More information on this subject can be found after installing the application.
